name: Hard Core Puzzle
description: This is a very hard-core puzzle casual game, bring you the purest gaming experience...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB+ Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10 Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,+++ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB+ Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
